resources.string: You’re connected to Relaynet via the Internet
So there’s not much to do here. Feel free to close this app and enjoy your Relaynet apps. \n\nCome back if you’re cut off from the Internet.
So you’re good to go! \n\nRemember: Your data is safe while it’s in transit and if it gets lost we’ll try to deliver it again.

You can still send and receive data from the Internet via Relaynet couriers: Simply connect to a nearby courier and we’ll do the rest. 

Remember: It’s impossible for anyone to see or change your data in transit, nor can anyone see which apps you’re using. 

Also, any data lost in transit will be re-delivered at the earliest opportunity.
If there’s a courier near you, connect to their Wi-Fi network to sync data.
Turn on your Wi-Fi if it’s off.
Wait until their device is ready.
We’re ready to exchange data with the courier.
Waiting for the incoming data to become available…
An error has occurred. You may try again.
Are you sure you want to interrupt the synchronization?
Relaynet enables compatible apps on your device to send and receive data from the Internet securely, even when you’re disconnected from the Internet.

When you’re connected to the Internet, your apps will simply use it seamlessly. \n\nWhen you’re cut off from the Internet, Relaynet couriers will transport your apps’ data securely to and from the Internet.

Relaynet apps use end-to-end encryption, so it’s impossible for this app or couriers to see their data. 

It’s also impossible for couriers to find out which apps you’re using. 

And needless to say we aren’t tracking you or your apps!
